activities.name: IncrementalSiteMainView
activities.description: select all data from DACJSONLoadSiteMain view

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  B_PUBID
      ,B_SOURCEID
      ,AccountID
      ,LocationID
      ,SITE_NAME
      ,SITE_TYPE
      ,IS_Active
      ,OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,ADDRESS_LINE1
      ,ADDRESS_LINE2
      ,CITY
      ,STATE_CODE
      ,POSTAL_CODE
      ,COUNTRY_CODE
      ,RAW_MAIN_PHONE
      ,RAW_FAX
      ,RAW_CS_PHONE
      ,RAW_CS_EMAIL
      ,RAW_LATITUDE
      ,RAW_LONGITUDE
      ,SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,Status
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,FP_SITE_ID
      ,CAST(CASE WHEN StoreLocatorDisabled = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS BIT)  as  StoreLocatorDisabled
  FROM Retail.DACIncrementalSiteMain

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
NEWID() AS SITE_CONTENT_ID
,'SiteContent' AS B_CLASSNAME
,[LocationNumber]
,[ExteriorPhoto]
,[FlyerLink]
,[Promotion1Image]  
      ,[Promotion1URL]
      ,[Promotion2URL]
      ,[Promotion2Image]
      ,[ScheduleApptURL]
      ,[AlternateWebsiteURL]
      ,convert(nvarchar(128),WebsiteURL) as WebsiteURL
	  ,convert(nvarchar(128),[BusinessDescription]) as BusinessDescription
      ,[BusinessLongDescription]
      ,convert(nvarchar(128),BusinessShortDescription) as BusinessShortDescription
	  ,convert(nvarchar(128),[BusinessName]) as BusinessName
      ,[ContentLanguage]
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,FP_SITE_ID
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent]

select 
NEWID() AS SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS_ID,
'SiteDefaultHours' AS B_CLASSNAME,
SITE_HOURS_TYPE,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
B_CREDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR
from Retail.DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours

SELECT B_PUBID
      ,LocationID
      ,B_SOURCEID
      ,SITE_NAME
      ,SITE_TYPE
      ,IS_Active
      ,OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,ADDRESS_LINE1
      ,ADDRESS_LINE2
      ,CITY
      ,STATE_CODE
      ,POSTAL_CODE
      ,COUNTRY_CODE
      ,RAW_MAIN_PHONE
      ,RAW_CS_PHONE
      ,RAW_CS_EMAIL
      ,RAW_LATITUDE
      ,RAW_LONGITUDE
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,'DAC' as FP_SITE_ID
      ,'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_ClassName
        FROM Retail.DACIncrementalSiteMain

select 
NEWID() AS SITE_SPECIAL_HOURS_ID,
'SiteSpecialtHours' AS B_CLASSNAME,
SPH_Date,
SPH_State,
SPH_StartTime,
SPH_Endtime,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
B_CREDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_PUBID,
FP_SITE_ID

from Retail.DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours
